scripts.start-sandbox: docker run --rm --name taia-x-sandbox --detach -p 20000:20000 tqtezos/flextesa:20210514 flobox start
scripts.compile: docker run --rm -v "%CD%":/cd -w /cd ligolang/ligo:0.30.0 compile contract ./contracts/src/taia_x_main.mligo --entry-point main > ./contracts/out/taia_x_main.tz
